definitions: an instance of thoroughly cleaning the inside of something

examples.text: the entire sewer is having a clean-out

shortDefinitions: instance of thoroughly cleaning inside something

definitions: an instance of removing and disposing of unwanted items or material

examples.text: I had a wardrobe clean-out, and I gave away two full bags of clothes
the leadership of this company needs a clean-out

shortDefinitions: removal and disposal of unwanted items or material
